data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

requestBody.title: Configure default hours and availability mode Snapshot

view.title: Configure default hours and availability mode
view.subtitle: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Hours completed
blocks.message: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.title: Configure default hours and availability mode Snapshot
